description.title: Drag-and-Drop Columns
description.content: Easily track your jobs and update job statuses effortlessly with drag-and-drop functionality.

description.title: Interactive Modals
description.content: Click on a job to view detailed information or the edit button to edit the job information.

description.title: Statistics Page
description.content: Track metrics like your response rate and application activity.

description.title: Store Your Documents
description.content: Upload and store multiple CVs and cover letters, all in one place for easy access during your job applications.

description.title: Easy Access Anytime
description.content: Retrieve your uploaded files anytime from any device, making it simple to update or submit them with just a few clicks.
